title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Information, Prevention and Preparedness - Self Regional Healthcare | Greenwood, SC
cleaned_text: COVID Vaccination Self Regional Drive Through Services is now offering Novavax COVID-19 vaccinations for those 12 years and older. We're excited to make this vaccine available in addition to the Pfizer shot. Novavax is protein-based, like most other vaccinations we all have been taking for decades. Our hope is that folks who have been reluctant to take the mRNA vaccines will now be more comfortable with Novavax. Schedule your Novavax, or any of the other COVID vaccinations by calling 725-8200 or by visiting [mychart.selfregional.org](https://mychart.selfregional.org/). Self Regional's Pediatric Associates Greenwood is now offering Pediatric COVID vaccines for established Self Medical Group patients 6 months to 11 years old and COVID booster vaccines for patients 5 to 11 years old. Please call 864-725-8200 to schedule your appointment. COVID-19 Testing Self Regional Drive Through Services offers COVID testing M-F, 8:30AM - 5PM (Closed Noon - 1:00PM.) To schedule your testing appointment, visit [mychart.selfregional.org](https://mychart.selfregional.org/) or call 725-8200. Virtual Care Services A quick and convenient video visit with an SRH provider is a great way to get care for non-emergent concerns (like colds, rash, minor injuries, etc.) Learn more by visiting: [https://www.selfregional.org/virtual-care/](https://www.selfregional.org/virtual-care/).
